"Gallant Man": "Hah, hah! Were these small fry the best it can do?"
"They just... They just keep coming! I won't let you get past me... Not towards the children! Uwaaaaa!"
"We can't... There's no end to them! We need to fall back now, or we'll be next!"
"We cannot run away! You fools, don't you remember what's behind us?"
"We came prepared for this! No regrets now! I'll take a few of them down with me!"
"Another close shave! We were right to hurry here!"
"It's alright, Gettemhart. These people are our allies!"
"Uh, is something wrong? Is there something wrong with his name too?"
"We'll talk about this another time! But first, let's take care of what's in front of us!"
